headline: Why Digital Realty Trust Stock Got Rocked Today
summary: It was a case of guilt by association with Digital Realty Trust's (NYSE: DLR) shares on Thursday.  This sent Digital Realty's shares down, too, and the stock ended up closing the day 1.5% lower in value.  In that event, Equinix divulged that its adjusted funds from operations (AFFO) -- widely considered the most crucial profitability metric for REITs -- would take a hit in the near future.
